document.discussion_title: Diploma PLC (DPLM) Cut to “Equal weight” at Barclays PLC
document.topic_text: Tweet Barclays PLC downgraded shares of Diploma PLC (LON:DPLM) to an equal weight rating in a research note issued to investors on Wednesday. Barclays PLC currently has GBX 836 ($10.76) price objective on the stock, up from their previous price objective of GBX 831 ($10.70). DPLM has been the topic of a number of other research reports. Royal Bank Of Canada reissued an outperform rating and set a GBX 950 ($12.23) price target on shares of Diploma PLC in a research report on Tuesday, May 17th. Peel Hunt reissued a hold rating and set a GBX 690 ($8.88) price target on shares of Diploma PLC in a research report on Monday, May 16th. Finally, Numis Securities Ltd reissued a hold rating and set a GBX 760 ($9.79) price target on shares of Diploma PLC in a research report on Monday, May 16th. Three research analysts have rated the stock with a hold rating and two have given a buy rating to the company’s stock. The stock presently has an average rating of Hold and an average price target of GBX 841.20 ($10.83). Diploma PLC ( LON:DPLM ) opened at 876.00 on Wednesday. The company’s 50 day moving average price is GBX 837.61 and its 200 day moving average price is GBX 765.66. The company’s market cap is GBX 990.32 million. Diploma PLC has a 52-week low of GBX 600.29 and a 52-week high of GBX 891.50. Diploma PLC is an international group of businesses supplying technical products and services. The Company operates in life sciences, seals and controls sectors. The Company in the life sciences sector is engaged in supplying consumables, instrumentation and related services to the healthcare and environmental industries. Diploma PLC Diploma PLC
